summary: Tested modal scrollability fix across all pages. All DialogContent components now have max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto classes applied. Verified that Job Card modal on Tickets page scrolls properly and shows all content including Status History and action buttons. Fixed a minor bug in Inventory page (SelectItem empty value).

issues: Console warnings about chart dimensions - not critical, charts still render

bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.issue: SelectItem with empty value causing runtime error: 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'
bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.fix: Changed SelectItem value from empty string to 'none' and updated onValueChange handler to convert 'none' back to empty string

tickets_job_card.details: Modal scrolls properly. Verified: Customer & Vehicle Details, Issue Details, Final Bill, Status History, and Print/Download button all visible after scrolling

employees_add_edit.details: Modal has 5 tabs (Personal, Employment, Salary, Compliance, Bank & Access). All tabs accessible and form scrollable

users_edit.details: Modal shows all fields (Name, Role, Designation, Active) with Cancel and Save Changes buttons visible

suppliers_add.details: Modal shows all fields with Cancel and Add Supplier buttons visible

inventory_add.details: Modal shows all fields with Cancel and Add Item buttons visible (after fixing SelectItem bug)

vehicles_add.details: Modal shows all fields with Cancel and Add Vehicle buttons visible

critical_code_review_comments: All DialogContent components correctly have max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto classes
Tickets page Job Card modal uses flex flex-col p-0 with separate scrollable content wrapper - good pattern for complex modals
